title: Handy Lyrics - As I Lay Dying
creator: Kultida Anekboon

extendedInfo.description: If you are As I Lay Dying's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check As I Lay Dying's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all As I Lay Dying's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of As I Lay Dying's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Beneath the Encasing of Ashes- Frail Words Collapse- Shadows Are Security- An Ocean Between Us- The Powerless Rise- Awakened************************List of lyrics ************************- 94 Hours- A Breath In The Eyes Of Eternity- A Greater Foundation- A Greater Foundation (Extended Demo Version)- A Long March- A Thousand Steps- An Ocean Between Us- Anger And Apathy- Anodyne Sea- Behind Me Lies Another Fallen Soldier- Beneath The Encasing Of Ashes- Beyond Our Suffering- Blood Turned To Tears- Bury Us All- Cauterize- Collision- Comfort Betrays- Condemned- Confined- Control Is Dead- Defender- Distance Is Darkness- Elegy- Empty Hearts- Falling Upon Deaf Ears- Forced To Die- Forever- Forsaken- I Never Wanted- Illusions- Losing Sight- Meaning In Tragedy- Morning Waits- My Only Home- No Lungs To Breathe- Nothing Left- Overcome- Parallels- Refined By Your Embrace- Reflection- Repeating Yesterday- Resilience- Song 10- Surrounded- Tear Out My Eyes- The Beginning- The Blinding Of False Light- The Darkest Nights- The Innocence Spilled- The Only Constant Is Change- The Pain Of Separation- The Plague- The Sound Of Truth- The Truth Of My Perception- The Voices That Betray Me- This Is Who We Are- Through Struggle- Torn Within- Undefined- Unwound- Upside Down Kingdom- Vacancy- Wasted Words- When This World Fades- Whispering Silence- Within Destruction- Without Conclusion- Wrath Upon Ourselves

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The app is perfect and almost all the lyrics are correct.
reviews.author: BLAKE Andersen
